docs.title: Welcome to the Columbia Urdu Poetry Group
docs.text: نظر میں ہے ہماری جادۂ راہِ فنا غالب کہ یہ شیرازہ ہے عالم کے اجزائے پریشاں کا naz̤ar meñ hai hamārī jādah-e rāh-e fanā ġhālib kih yih shīrāzah hai ʿālam ke ajzā-e pareshāñ kā

docs.title: About
docs.text:
The Columbia Urdu Poetry Group is a circle of readers that started meeting in 2008 on Friday evenings at Cafe Layla near Columbia University in the City of New York at inspirational instigation of Tabinda M Khan, a Pakistani PhD student at Columbia’s Department of Political Science at the time. Tabinda requested Dr Frances W Pritchett, Professor of Urdu at Columbia’s Department of Middle Eastern, South Asian, and African Studies (MESAAS), to kindly chair the reading group, devoted to Urdu poets in general and Mirza Ghalib in particular. Initially consisting of Dr Pritchett’s circle of undergraduate and graduate Urdu students enrolled in different departments at Columbia University, the circle soon extended to Urdu enthusiasts from all over Manhattan, New York in general, and beyond. Right from the beginning our group met as an informal group of friends, who never wanted any ‘baRe aadmii’ to lecture to us. What we have in common is a desire to enjoy Urdu poetry together, and to help each other understand it in more depth. Our readings have centered on the classical ghazal poets, above all Ghalib and Mir, but our scope has frequently been broad enough to include a wider range of poets, especially modern ones. Our weekly reading group has been growing strong thankfully for fourteen years now, and our shared enjoyment of Urdu poetry has resulted in many lasting friendships, especially during the pandemic years, when Zoom helped us continue to meet virtually and re-connect with new and old members from different parts of the United States, and the world. Most of us know Urdu script, but we also provide texts in Devanagari script. Our group includes native speakers from South Asia, diasporic ‘heritage learners’, and non-South-Asian students of Urdu at all levels. We all help each other, and we enjoy each other’s company, and there’s always that brilliant poetry to light up our Friday evenings.

At its core, this group has been drawn and held together by the desire to benefit from Dr Pritchett’s generous guidance and warm and lively company, and over the years, it has been grateful to some key members for their strenuous, dedicated, and devoted efforts at coordination. Tabinda Khan was the first coordinator of the group, and after that the task was taken up by Zahra Sabri, an MA student at MESAAS, Dalpat Rajpurohit, a Hindi lecturer at MESAAS, Adeeba Talukdar, a poet who completed her undergraduate at New York University, and for the past several years (and indeed most of the group’s existence!) by Mushtaq Fadra, a health care entrepreneur in New York who has taken the group’s outreach and coordination to new heights. We also owe thanks to Rupa Ranganathan, a multicultural marketing professional, for her generous aid in running the group, and to Vishal K. Kella, a data engineer, for his vision and efforts in putting together this website which archives all the poetry we have read in recent years, and links it to audio renditions that our group members have come together to find and share from time to time. We hope that visitors to the site will enjoy the texts and audios as much as we did when we encountered them.

• zikr us parii-vash kaa aur phir bayaaN apnaa
  • Darshan

• jaur se baaz aae par baaz aaeN kyaa
  • gaahe gaahe bas ab yahi ho kya
• boli khud-sar hava ek zarra hai tu
• sach hai hamin ko aap ke shikve baja na the
• sar men sauda bhi nahin dil men tamanna bhi nahin

• husn ghamze ki kashakash se chhuta mere ba’d
  • dil men ik lahr si uThi hai abhi

• Hum Se Kuchh Aage Zamane Mein Hua Kya Kya Kuchh
  • Kya Kya Kuch

• phir is andaaz se bahaar aaii
  • phir charagh-e-lala se raushan hue koh o daman

• Ratjage
  • chandi vale, shishe vale, ankhon vaale shahr men

• junuuN kii dast-giirii kis se ho gar ho nah uryaanii
  • zulmat ko ziya sarsar ko saba bande ko khuda kya likhna

• kyun jal gaya nah tab-e rukh-e yar dekh kar
  • chhoTa sa ik gaanv tha jis men

• larazta hai mira dil zahmat-e mihr-e darakhshan par
  • Gori Karat Singhar

• Ye Galiyon Ke Aware Bekaar Kutte
  • hai baskih har ik un ke ishaare meiN nishaaN aur

• Bol Ke Lab Azad Hain Tere
  • laazim tha kih dekho mera rasta koi din aur

• hariif-e-matlab-e mushkil nahiN fusuun-e-niyaaz
  • Ae Meri Hum-Raqs Mujh Ko Thaam Le

• yeh nah thi hamari qismat kih visal-e-yaar hota
  • Tujhe Adam Nahin Milta Khuda Ki Justaju Kaisi
  • Az Husn-e-Malih-e-Khud Shor-e-Bajahan Kar Di

• is vaqt to yuun lagta hai ab kuchh bhi nahin hai
  • phir koi aaya dil-e-zar nahin koi nahin

• bano pichhle pahar asghar ke li’e roti hai
  • kyunkar us but se rakhun jan ‘aziz
  • vus’at-e sa’i-e karam dekh kih sar-ta-sar-e khak

• vo jis ki diid men lakhon masarraten pinhan
  • muzhdah ai zauq-e asiri kih nazar ata hai

• rukh-e nigar se hai soz-e javidani-e sham’a
  • kisi aur gham men itni khalish-e-nihan nahin hai

• arz-o-sama men ‘ishq hai sari charon or bhara hai ‘ishq
  • mihr-e qiyamat chahat afat fitnah fasad bala hai ‘ishq

• Aziz Itna Hi Rakkho Ki Ji Sambhal Ja’e
  • Kuchh Ishq Tha Kuchh Majburi Thi So Main Ne Jiwan War Diya

• kisi ke dast-e-inayat ne kunj-e-zindan men
  • zakhm par chhirken kahan tiflan-e be-parva namak

• chadar aur chaar-diwari
  • ek aurat ki hansi
  • aah ko chaahiye ik umr asar hote tak

• kaam ab koi na aaega bas ik dil ke siva
  • khule hain mashriq-o-maghrib ki god men gulzar
  • hai kis qadar halaak-e-fareb-e vafaa-e-gul

• mujh ko mere nasib ne roz-e-azal se kya diya
  • Gham nahiN hota hai aazaadoN ko besh az yak nafas

• saaz ye kina-saz kya janen
  • kisi ko de ke dil koi navaa-sanj-e fuGaaN kyuN ho

• kya hue bad-e-bayaban ke pukare hue log
  • kii vafaa ham se to Gair us ko jafaa kahte haiN

• abru kya khak us gul ki kih gulshan men nahin
  • arz-o-sama kahan tiri vusat ko pa sake

• ham par jafaa se tark-e-vafaa kaa gumaa;N nahii;N
  • khabar-e-tahayyur-e-ishq sun na junun raha na pari rahi

• ishq taa;siir se naumed nahii;N
  • yaar ko ham ne ja-ba-ja dekha

• aage baDhe na qissa-e-ishq-e-butan se ham
  • jahaa;N teraa naqsh-e qadam dekhte hai;N

• Kabhi Ae Haqeeqat-e-Muntazar Nazar Aa Libas-e-Majaaz Mein
  • dekh to dil ki jaan se uThta hai

• silsile toD gaya wo sabhi jate jate
  • dekh lete hain ab us baam ko aate jate

• miltii hai xuu-e yaar se naar iltihaab me;N
  • laai hayat aae qaza le chali chale
  • laai hayat aae qaza le chali chale

• kal ke liye kar aaj nah ;xissat sharaab me;N
  • ek chhoTa sa laDka tha main jin dinon
  • log puchhenge kyuun udaas ho tum

• kuchh to hava bhi sard thi kuchh tha tira khayal bhi
  • main faqat chalti rahi manzil ko sar us ne kiya

• yadon ke baagh se vo hara-pan nahin gaya
  • kya main bhi pareshani-e khatir se qarin tha

• hairaa;N huu;N dil ko rouu;N kih pii;Tuu;N jigar ko mai;N
  • zakhm dabe to phir naya tiir chala diya karo

• aa ki vabasta hain us husn ki yaden tujh se
  • shab-e hijr me;N kam ta:zallum kiyaa

• naalah juz husn-e :talab ai sitam-iijaad nahii;N
  • ik chameli ke manDve-tale
  • ye kaun aata hai tanhaiyon men jaam liye
• zikr meraa bah badii bhii use man:zuur nahii;N
• shahr ki raat aur main nashad o nakara phirun

• garche gul ki sej ho tis par bhi uD jaati hai niind
  • gul ke hone ki tavaqqo pe jiye baiThi hai
  • mu;Nh takaa hii kare hai jis tis kaa

• Aa Dhamke ‘Aish o Tarab
  • Jab Phaagun Rang Jhamakte Hon

• taaza hava bahar ki dil ka malal le gai
  • dil laga kar lag gaya un ko bhi tanha baithna
  • donon jahan de ke vuh samjhe yih khvush raha
  • ho gai hai ghair ki shirin-bayani kar-gar
  • qiyamat hai kih sun laila ka dasht-e qais men ana

• dil baham pahu;Nchaa badan me;N tab se saaraa tan jalaa
  • kab mera nasheman ahl-e-chaman gulshan men gavara karte hain

• hai justuju ki khuub se hai khub-tar kahan
  • tere tausan ko sabaa baa;Ndhte hai;N

• Khuda Hafiz Musalmanon Ka Akbar
  • khuda ali-gaDh ke madrase ko tamam amraz se shifa de

• dahr me;N naqsh-e vafaa vaj’h-e tasallii nah huaa
  • Behta Darya Tha Magar Qulzum-e-Hasti Na Hua

• daim para hua tire dar par nahin hun main
  • farhaad haath teshe pah Tuk rah ke Daaltaa

• nazar jhukaaye urus-e fitrat, jabiN se zulfeN haTa rahi hai
  • gul sharm se bah jaega gulshan men ho kar ab sa

• sab kahan kuchh lalah-o-gul men numayan ho gain
  • garmi se main to atish-e gham ki pighal gaya

• sharma gae laja gae daman chhuDa gae
  • ta bah maqdur intizar kiya

• diivaanagii se dosh pah zunnaar bhii nahii;N
  • fikr hi Thahri to dil ko fikr-e-khuban kyuun na ho

• ye baten jhuTi baten hain ye logon ne phailai hain
  • dil se shauq-e ru;x-e nikuu nah gayaa

• maze jahaan ke apnii na:zar me;N ;xaak nahii;N
  • haqiqaton ka jalal denge sadaqaton ka jamal denge

• ghunchah-e na-shiguftah ko dur se mat dikha kih yun
  • charagh-e-tur jalao baDa andhera hai

• Jo Tha Nahin Hai, Jo Hai Na Ho Ga, Yehi Hai Ek Harf-e-Mehrmana
  • phuta kiye piyale lundhta phira qaraba

• hasad se dil agar afsurdah hai garm-e tamaashaa ho
  • ka’be men ja raha to nah do ta’nah kya kahin
  • Tere Aane Ka Intezar Raha

• ek ek qa:tre kaa mujhe denaa pa;Raa ;hisaab
  • gae dinon ka suragh le kar kidhar se aaya kidhar gaya vo

• ku-e-sitam ki khamushi abad kuchh to ho
  • va-rastah is se hain kih muhabbat hi kyun nah ho

• na harif-e-jan na sharik-e-gham shab-e-intizar koi to ho
  • muvaa mai;N sijde me;N par naqsh meraa baar rahaa

• qafas men hun gar achchha bhi nah janen mere shevan ko
  • ai dekhne vaalo

• mujh sa na de zamane ko parvardigar dil
  • dil ke tain atish-e hijran se bachaya nah gaya
• khushi ne mujh ko Thukraya hai dard-o-gham ne paala hai

• dhota hun jab main pine ko us sim-tan ke panv
  • galyon men ab talak to mazkur hai hamara
• mujh par hai yih naz’ kaa ‘aalam ko’ii dam aur

• van pahunch kar jo ghash ata pae-ham hai ham ko
  • farz karo ham ahl-e-vafa hon, farz karo divane hon

• sahar-gah ‘id men daur-e sabu tha
  • kuchh bhi tha sach ke taraf-dar hua karte the

• muntazir kab se tahayyur hai teri taqriir ka
  • tum jano tum ko ghair se jo rasm-o-rah ho

• kamar bandhe hue chalne ko yaan sab yaar baiThe hain
  • rah-e daur-e ‘ishq men rota hai kya

• gai vuh bat kih ho guft-go to kyunkar ho
  • ham ko yaan dar dar phiraya yaar ne

• ghamze ne us ke chori men dil ki hunar kiya
  • Doston Kya Kya Diwali Mein Nishat-o-Aish Hai

• jahan tera naqsh-e qadam dekhte hain
  • gada dast-e-ahl-e-karam dekhte hain

• TaKhallus-ishq-e butaaN
  • asar us ko zara nahin hota

• kisi ko de ke dil koi nava-sanj-e fighan kyun ho
  • ye kuche ye nilam ghar dilkashi ke

• az mihr ta bah-zarrah dil-o-dil hai ainah
  • hai sabzah-zar har dar-o-divar-e gham-kadah
  • rahye ab aisi jagah chal kar jahan koi nah ho
  • yih hasrat hai marun is men liye lab-rez paimana

• sada rahe tera gham salamat yahi asasa hai aabru ka
  • bar-ha gor dil jhanka laya

• jab dil ki rahguzar pe tira naqsh-e-pa na tha
  • masjid ke zer-e sayah kharabat chahiye

• majlis-e-gham, na koi bazm-e-tarab, kya karte
  • paigham-e gham jigar ka gulzar tak nah pahuncha

• bismil ke taDapne ki adaon men nasha tha
  • bisat-e ‘ajz men tha ek dil yak qatrah khun vuh bhi

• gham-e dunya se gar pai bhi fursat sar uthane ki
  • pal men jahan ko dekhte mere dubo chuka

• uzr aane men bhi hai aur bulate bhi nahin
  • gham raha jab tak kih dam men dam raha

• kya tang ham sitam-zadagan ka jahan hai
  • kya musibat-zadah dil mail-e azar nah tha

• sar-gashtagi men ‘alam-e hasti se yas hai
  • kya din the vuh kih yan bhi dil-e aramidah tha

• jo charagh saare bujha chuke unhen intizar kahan raha
  • gar khamushi se faidah ikhfa-e hal hai

• mata-e-be-baha hai dard-o-soz-e-arzumandi
  • ji men hai yad-e rukh-o-zulf-e siyah-fam bahut

• ek qatra ashk ka chhalka to dariya kar diya
  • jiita hai sirf tere liye kaun mar ke dekh

• ek ja harf-e vafa likkha tha so bhi mit gaya
  • ho admi ai charkh tark-e gardish-e ayyam kar

• ‘ishq mujh ko nahin vahshat hi sahi
  • darhi safed shaikh ki tu mat nazar men kar

• kabhi sunte hain aql-o-hosh ki aur kam bhi piite hain
  • shab-e-asia ke andhere men sar-e-rah jis ki thi raushni

• us bazm men mujhe nahin banti haya kiye
  • na koi rabt ba-juz khamushi o nafrat ke

• raftar-e ‘umr qat’-e rah-e iztirab hai
  • jhute bhi puchhte nahin tuk hal an kar

• zara mausam to badla hai magar peDon ki shakhon par nae patton ke aane men abhi kuchh din lagenge
  • har jazr-o-mad se dast-o-baghal uthte hain kharosh

• dekhna qismat kih ap apne pah rashk a jae hai
  • ab to mazhab koi aisa bhi chalaya jaae

• kin lafzon men itni kaDvi itni kasili baat likhun
  • mir-e gum-kardah-chaman zamzamah-pardaz hai ek

• sadagi par us ki mar jane ki hasrat dil men hai
  • tabiat in dinon begana-e-gham hoti jaati hai

• dil se tiri nigah jigar tak utar gai
  • jab se khat hai siyah khal ki thang

• taskin ko ham nah roen jo zauq-e nazar mile
  • khirad ke paas khabar ke siva kuchh aur nahin

• koi din gar zindagani aur hai
  • gul ki jafa bhi jani dekhi vafa-e bulbul

• nahin ishq men is ka to ranj hamen ki qarar o shakeb zara na raha
  • kaisa chaman asiri men kis ko udhar khayal

• koi ummid bar nahin ati
  • kya bulbul-e asir hai be-bal-o-par kih ham

• bahut pahle se un qadmon ki aahaT jaan lete hain
  • ham aap hii ko apnaa maqsuud jaante hai;N

• dost! main dekh chuka taj-mahal
  • taaj tere liye ik mazhar-e-ulfat hi sahi
  • ik shahanshah ne banva ke hasin taj-mahal

• dil-e na-dan tujhe hua kya hai
  • kiya jo ‘arz kih dil sa shikar laya hun
• haaN anaa hai voh dabir e-nafs o daara e-hayaat
• phir kuchh ik dil ko beqarari hai
• kiya main ne ro kar fishar-e gareban
• be-etidaliyon se subuk sab men ham hue

• zulmat-kade men mere shab-e gham ka josh hai
  • dekhen to teri kab tak yih kaj-adaiyan hain

• a kih miri jan ko qarar nahin hai
  • main kaun hun ai ham-nafasan sokhtah-jan hun

• jis bazm men tu naz se guftar men ave
  • garmi-e-hasrat-e-nakam se jal jaate hain
• mila jo mauqa to rok dunga ‘jalal’ roz-e-hisab tera

• na ganvao navak-e-nim-kash dil-e-reza-reza ganva diya
  • husn-e mah garchih bah hangam-e kamal achchha hai

• misal-e sayah muhabbat men jal apna hun
  • kabhi kaha na kisi se tire fasane ko

• nah hui gar mire marne se tasalli nah sahi
  • kahe hai kohkan kar fikr meri khastah-hali men

• ‘ajab nashat se jallad ke chale hain ham age
  • jahan ab khar-zaren ho gai hain

• Khutba-e-Zainab - Yazid Ke Darbar Mein
  • achchhi lage hai tujh bin gul-gasht-e bagh kis ko

• har ek baat pah kahte ho tum kih tuu kyaa hai
  • jo zaahir na ho vo lataafat nahiN hai

• din guzarta hai mujhe fikr hi men ta kya ho
  • pahlu e shah meN ye duKhtar e jamhoor ki qabr

• ghair len mahfil men bose jam ke
  • jigar lohu ko tarse hai main sach kahta hun dil-khastah

• haa’e dekha hi nahiN moosa ne aalam noor ka
  • milti hai khu-e yar se nar iltihab men

• kab vuh sunta hai kahani meri
  • kuchh mauj-e hava pechan ai mir nazar ai

• har qadam duri-e manzil hai numayan mujh se
  • bah rang-e bu-e gul is bagh ke ham ashna hote
• tum jo aa jaao aaj dilli men

• nuktah-chin hai gham-e dil us ko sunae nah bane
  • dhab hain tere se bagh men gul ke

• vuh a ke khvab men taskin-e iztirab to de
  • hasti apni habab ki si hai
• tapish se meri vaqf-e kashmakash har tar-e bistar hai

• faryad ki koi lai nahin hai
  • dil ke ma’mure ki mat kar fikr fursat chahiye

• be-khudi pe tha ‘fani’ kuchh na ikhtiyar apna
  • hamen ghash a gaya tha vuh badan dekh

• diya hai dil agar us ko bashar hai kya kahiye
  • ibtida se ham zaiif o na-tavan paida hue

• dekh kar dar-pardah garm-e daman-afshani mujhe
  • rat guzre hai mujhe naz’a men rote rote

• huzur-e shah men ahl-e sukhan ki azmaish hai
  • zalim kahin to mil kabhu daru piye hue

• ‘umr bhar ham rahe sharabi se
  • chala aa raha huun samundaron ke visal se
• kabhi neki bhi us ke ji men gar a jae hai mujh se

• aaj yuun mauj-dar-mauj gham tham gaya is tarah gham-zadon ko qarar aa gaya
  • kal dil-azurdah gulistan se guzar ham ne kiya

• kahun jo hal to kahte ho mudda’a kahiye
  • dil gaya muft aur dukh paya

• rone se aur ‘ishq men be-bak ho gae
  • jo kaho tum so hai baja sahib

• jab tak dahan-e zakhm nah paida kare koi
  • kya kahun tum se main kih kya hai ‘ishq
• ‘arz-e naz-e shokhi-e dandan barae khandah hai

• bahut muddat gai hai ab tuk a mil
  • likh diya apne dar pe kisi ne is jagah pyaar karna mana hai
  • yaaro kisi qatil se kabhi pyaar na mango

• ibn-e maryam hua kare koi
  • karta nahin qusur hamare halak men

• bagh pa kar khafaqani yih darata hai mujhe
  • ai mujh se tujh ko sau mile tujh sa nah paya ek main

• hazaron khvahishen aisi kih har khvahish pah dam nikle
  • nah mail arsi ka rah sarapa dard hoga tu

• kya chahre khuda ne diye un khvush pisaron ko
  • dabegi kab talak avaz-e-adam ham bhi dekhenge

• hujum-e nalah hairat ‘ajiz-e ‘arz-e yak-afghan hai
  • ankhon men bas ke dil men sama kar chale gae

• paida nahin jahan men qaid-e jahan se rastah
  • ‘momin’ khuda ke vaste aisa makan na chhoD

• khamoshiyon men tamasha ada nikalti hai
  • mir darya hai sune shi’r zabani us ki
• Khud Shama Ban Gaye Mujhe Parvaana Kar Diya

• farishton se bhi achchha main bura hone se pahle tha
  • shabnam bah gul-e lalah nah khali z ada hai

• ik lafz-e-mohabbat ka adna ye fasana hai
  • kartaa hai kab suluuk vuh ahl-e niyaaz se

• manzur thi yih shakl tajalli ko nur ki
  • rishtah kya thahrega yih jaise kih mu nazuk hai

• gham khane men boda dil-e na-kam bahut hai
  • din-o-dil ke gham ko asan na-tavan main le gaya
• muddat hui hai yar ko mihman kiye hue

• naved-e amn hai bedad-e dost jan ke liye
  • ahval nah puchho kuchh ham zulm-rasidon ka
• naqsh faryadi hai kis ki shokhi-e tahrir ka

• umron ki masafat se
  • kiya hai ‘ishq jab se main ne us turk-e sipahi ka

• juz qais aur koi nah aya bah ru-e kar
  • akhiri baar milo

• bol re jee ab saajan jee kaa mukhdaa hai kis darpan kaa
  • ajab nahin hai nah jane jo mir chah ki rit
• kahte ho nah denge ham dil agar para paya

• dil mira soz-e nihan se be-muhaba jal gaya
  • kal le gae the yar hamen bhi chaman ke bich

• shauq har rang raqib-e sar-o-saman nikla
  • har chand sarf-e gham hain le dil jigar se jan tak

• dhamki men mar gaya jo nah bab-e nabard tha
  • qatl-gah men dast-bos us ka karen fi al-faur log

• dahr men naqsh-e vafa vaj’h-e tasalli nah hua
  • thandi sansen bharen hain jalte hain kya tab men hain

• satayish-gar hai zahid is qadar jis bagh-e rizvan ka
  • mohabbat karne vaale kam na honge

• nah hoga yak-bayaban mandagi se zauq kam mera
  • sarapa rahn-e ‘ishq-o-na-guzir-e ulfat-e hasti
  • mariz-e-muhabbat unhin ka fasana sunata raha dam nikalte nikalte

• raad huun barq huun bechain huun paara huun main
